ModMetaData.name: Stable Compatibility
ModMetaData.author: makabakaakawaka
ModMetaData.description:
使得原本完全随机的隐藏系统“匹配度”变得可调节。
“匹配度”可决定角色之间的互动效果，如（深入交流、闲聊、怠慢、羞辱）这类效果中，匹配值与正面反馈出现的频率与成正比，与负面反馈成反比。
注意1：原版“匹配度”最常见的范围是（-2~3），系统生成的最大范围或许是（-7~9）。
注意2：将匹配度都拉高并不意味着“好处”更大。因为关系值高了之后，将不断出现告白，但此模组并未修改告白相关内容，所以可能产生大量告白被拒绝的事件而导致大量角色心情减少。（如果非要使用很高数值的设置，建议搭配《Romance On The Rim》之类的模组）
- - -
This module allows you to adjust a hidden value: Compatibility.
Compatibility affects the social effect between pawns, for example "Deep Talk"、"Chitchat"、"Slighted".
Note1: The common range of the original Compatibility is -2~3. (Maximum range maybe is -7~9)。
Note2: The maximum Compatibility does not mean the maximum benefit! Because the pawn may fall into the repeated torture of showing love and refusing to show love. It may even appear that A shows love to B, B refuses to show love, and then B shows love to A, A refuses to show love... But using mods like "Romance On The Rim" at the same time can avoid this situation.
